catalogue_raissonne:
Masterpieces from the Japanese painting collection of the Minneapolis Institute of Art
ミネアポリス美術館 日本絵画の名品 Cat.32
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: iris plant with two blue blossoms, and a third blue bud growing along a swirling stream; foliage has mottled appearance; winding stream along LL and bottom edge; bone roller ends
medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk
title: Blue Iris
